name: Skwid Game
description:
Hi There ! This is my game based on web series Skwid game i hope you like it.This game ismade for one button game jam!

In this game you are a player and you need to go to the finish line without dying!

Hold 'W' to walk up straight! and release to stop!

Use Headbar light which show you when you have to stop or when you have to move!
